name: assembling the cooler
description:
assembling the cooler is a 1-bit 2D platformer where you play as a walking TV trying to assemble a cooler.

The goal of the game is collecting cogs and putting them in the machine to decrease the temperature. You need 10 cogs out of 12 to assemble the cooler.

The game was made in Godot in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam #53.

The wild cards I used are in the splash screen (4 colors and temperature).
